title: Titan Fitness Hamstring Lower Back and Glute Trainer
desc: Like new condition with vinyl padding, padded ankle rollers and sturdy footplates. Features 10 adjustable settings, galvanized steel frame, 41" height, 45.5" width, 70" depth. Product weight 190lbs, max weight capacity 350lbs. Refurbished and in good working order.
long_desc:
The Titan Fitness Hamstring Lower Back and Glute Trainer is in like new condition, offering exceptional value for your strength training facility.

CONDITION & QUALITY:
This equipment features premium vinyl padding throughout, ensuring comfort during intense workouts. The padded ankle rollers provide secure positioning, while the sturdy footplates offer stability and support.

KEY FEATURES:
• 10 adjustable settings for customized workout angles
• Galvanized steel frame for durability and corrosion resistance
• Compact dimensions: 41" height x 45.5" width x 70" depth
• Product weight: 190lbs
• Maximum user weight capacity: 350lbs

EQUIPMENT STATUS:
This unit has been professionally refurbished and is in excellent working order. All components have been inspected, tested, and serviced to ensure optimal performance.

DELIVERY & INSTALLATION:
Delivery and installation services are available for an additional cost. Equipment is located in Oakdale, PA. Please contact us to discuss delivery options and scheduling.

title: Precor Stretch Trainer
desc: Helps stretch back, hips, shoulders and legs for optimal recovery. Built in visual guide, industrial grade steel tubing, 3D urethane molded foam padding. Dimensions 52" length, 28" width. End caps will be replaced as well as the safety band. Some rust pictured, otherwise in good working order and refurbished. Retails at over $1200 brand new.
long_desc:
The Precor StretchTrainer is designed to help you achieve optimal recovery by stretching your back, hips, shoulders, and legs effectively.

RECOVERY BENEFITS:
This specialized stretching equipment targets multiple muscle groups, promoting flexibility and reducing post-workout soreness. Perfect for athletes and fitness enthusiasts looking to enhance their recovery routine.

BUILD QUALITY:
• Industrial grade steel tubing ensures long-lasting durability
• 3D urethane molded foam padding provides superior comfort
• Built-in visual guide assists with proper stretching techniques
• Compact footprint: 52" length x 28" width

REFURBISHMENT DETAILS:
This unit has been professionally refurbished. End caps will be replaced, and the safety band will be renewed. Some surface rust is visible in photos but does not affect functionality. The equipment is in good working order.

VALUE:
This Precor StretchTrainer retails for over $1,200 brand new, making this refurbished unit an exceptional value at $550.

LOCATION & DELIVERY:
Equipment is located in Oakdale, PA. Delivery and installation services are available at an additional cost. Contact us to arrange pickup or delivery.

title: Precor Commercial AMT 885 with p80 Console
desc: Open stride feature allowing infinite stride patterns. Dual action for both upper and lower body workout. Electronic readouts include distance, calories, heart rate, time elapsed. Personal viewing touch screen 15in. Quick start, motion controls, resistance levels up to 20. Preset programs include Lose weight, Fat Burner, Aerobic, Be Fit, Manual, Rolling Hills, Mountain peaks, and Hill Climb. Refurbished and in good working order.
long_desc:
The Precor Commercial AMT 885 with p80 Console is a premium adaptive motion trainer that delivers a complete full-body workout experience.

INNOVATIVE STRIDE TECHNOLOGY:
The open stride feature allows for infinite stride patterns, giving you the freedom to move naturally. This adaptive motion technology responds to your body's natural movement patterns, creating a more comfortable and effective workout.

FULL-BODY TRAINING:
• Dual action design targets both upper and lower body simultaneously
• Engage your arms, legs, core, and cardiovascular system in one efficient workout
• Motion-controlled resistance adjusts automatically to your pace

ADVANCED CONSOLE FEATURES:
• 15-inch personal viewing touch screen for entertainment and workout data
• Electronic readouts display: distance, calories burned, heart rate, and time elapsed
• Quick start function for immediate workout initiation
• 20 resistance levels for progressive training

WORKOUT PROGRAMS:
Choose from 8 preset programs:
• Lose Weight
• Fat Burner
• Aerobic
• Be Fit
• Manual
• Rolling Hills
• Mountain Peaks
• Hill Climb

EQUIPMENT CONDITION:
This commercial-grade unit has been professionally refurbished and is in excellent working order. All electronic components have been tested and calibrated.

DELIVERY:
Located in Oakdale, PA. Delivery and installation available at an additional cost.

title: Cybex Total Body ARCTrainer 626AT
desc: Has glide, stride and climb zones. Reverse Arc movement and muscle targeting. Programs include Quick start, manual, three weight loss, three cardio, two strength and heart rate control. Ten levels to control both incline and resistance. Machine weight 412lbs, maximum weight 400lb. Refurbished and in good working order.
long_desc:
The Cybex Total Body ARCTrainer 626AT is a versatile cardio machine that combines three distinct workout zones into one powerful training system.

THREE WORKOUT ZONES:
• Glide Zone: Smooth, low-impact movement for warm-up and recovery
• Stride Zone: Traditional elliptical motion for cardiovascular training
• Climb Zone: Inclined climbing motion for intense lower body engagement

REVERSE ARC TECHNOLOGY:
The innovative Reverse Arc movement pattern targets muscles differently than traditional ellipticals, providing unique muscle activation and reducing repetitive stress on joints.

ADVANCED PROGRAMMING:
This machine offers comprehensive workout options:
• Quick Start for immediate workouts
• Manual mode for custom training
• Three Weight Loss programs
• Three Cardio programs
• Two Strength programs
• Heart Rate Control mode

CONTROL FEATURES:
• 10 incline levels
• 10 resistance levels
• Independent control of both incline and resistance
• Maximum user weight: 400lbs

SPECIFICATIONS:
• Machine weight: 412lbs (heavy-duty commercial construction)
• Maximum user weight capacity: 400lbs
• Professional refurbishment completed
• All systems tested and operational

LOCATION:
Equipment located in Oakdale, PA. Delivery and installation available at additional cost.

title: Cybex 625T Commercial Treadmill
desc: Speed range 0.5-12.4 mph, elevation range 0%-15%, running area 60"-22". Max user weight 400lbs. Workouts include QuickStart, HR Control, 1 Mile fitness test. Emergency stop safety lanyard. HR monitor, wireless and contact. Refurbished and in good working order.
long_desc:
The Cybex 625T Commercial Treadmill is a professional-grade running machine built for serious training and commercial facility use.

SPEED & ELEVATION:
• Speed range: 0.5 to 12.4 mph (covers walking to sprinting)
• Elevation range: 0% to 15% incline
• Large running surface: 60" length x 22" width
• Accommodates users up to 400lbs

SAFETY FEATURES:
• Emergency stop safety lanyard for immediate shutdown
• Heart rate monitoring via wireless and contact sensors
• Commercial-grade construction for durability and safety

WORKOUT PROGRAMS:
• QuickStart: Begin training immediately
• HR Control: Maintain target heart rate zones
• 1 Mile Fitness Test: Measure your cardiovascular fitness

COMMERCIAL QUALITY:
Built to withstand high-volume use in commercial fitness facilities. This treadmill features robust construction and reliable performance.

REFURBISHMENT:
This unit has been professionally refurbished and is in excellent working order. All mechanical and electronic components have been inspected, serviced, and tested.

DELIVERY:
Located in Oakdale, PA. Delivery and installation services available at an additional cost. Contact us to schedule delivery.

title: Magnum Multi-adjustable Bench LP
desc: Like new condition. Low 17.8" floor to bench height to minimize lower back stress and prevents arching. 0-75 degree angulation, with seat and back pad moving in unison to minimize adjusting. Less than 1" space between seat and back pad. Back pad is bolted to frame to improve stability. Max training weight is 600lbs. 12 available.
long_desc:
The Magnum Multi-adjustable Bench LP is in like new condition and designed for serious strength training with ergonomic features that protect your lower back.

ERGONOMIC DESIGN:
• Low 17.8" floor-to-bench height minimizes lower back stress
• Prevents arching during heavy lifts
• Reduces risk of lower back injury

ADJUSTMENT FEATURES:
• 0-75 degree angulation range
• Seat and back pad move in unison for quick adjustments
• Less than 1" gap between seat and back pad (no uncomfortable gaps)
• Smooth adjustment mechanism

STABILITY & DURABILITY:
• Back pad is bolted directly to frame for maximum stability
• No wobble or movement during heavy lifts
• Maximum training weight capacity: 600lbs
• Commercial-grade construction

AVAILABILITY:
We have 12 units available in like new condition. Perfect for outfitting a complete strength training area or replacing existing benches.

CONDITION:
These benches are in excellent condition, showing minimal wear. All adjustment mechanisms are smooth and functional.

LOCATION:
Located in Oakdale, PA. Pickup available, or delivery and installation can be arranged for an additional cost.

title: Dumbbell Set with Rack
desc: Great quality and gently used equipment. Two weights per size of dumbbell. Goes from 5lbs to 50lbs. Complete set with matching rack for organized storage and easy access during workouts.

COMPLETE SET INCLUDES:
• Two dumbbells per weight size (perfect for pairs)
• Weight range: 5lbs to 50lbs

QUALITY & CONDITION:

• Gently used - excellent condition

• Rack is sturdy and functional

WEIGHT PROGRESSION:
The set includes pairs at:
• 5lbs, 10lbs, 15lbs, 20lbs, 25lbs, 30lbs, 35lbs, 40lbs, 45lbs, 50lbs

RACK FEATURES:
• Keeps your workout space organized
• Easy access during training sessions
• Prevents weights from cluttering the floor
• Professional appearance

IDEAL FOR:
• Home gyms
• Commercial facilities
• Personal training studios
• Anyone building a complete strength training setup

Located in Oakdale, PA. Pickup available, or delivery and installation can be arranged for an additional price.

desc: Dumbbells not included. Rubber matting for shock absorption and grip. Max Load PER shelf 450lbs. Missing top right guard/handle for end. See pictures for details. Perfect for organizing your dumbbell collection.

title: Precor Vitality Series Leg Extension Machine
desc: Multiple start positions for workout flexibility. Self aligning ankle pad for comfort and convenience. Instructional placard included. Ability to weight stack in 10lb increments. Precision, lubricated bushings for smooth operation. 11 gauge electro weld steel. Dimensions 53" L x 45" W x 61" H. Cosmetic wear and tear on ankle roller pad.

desc: Soft Trac triple cell cushioning system for shock absorbency. Centered dual purpose fans. User friendly console and keypad. Large scrolling message window, user specific workout programs, heart rate display. Product weight 514 lbs. Maximum user weight 350lbs. 21.5" wide belt, 7" step up height. Powder coated steel frame. Refurbished and in good working order.

The Star Trac S-TRX Commercial Grade Treadmill combines advanced cushioning technology with user-friendly features for an exceptional running experience.

SHOCK ABSORPTION TECHNOLOGY:

Moves forward and backwards with flywheel placed in the rear, allowing for a quieter ride. Hand sensors for HR monitoring. Exercises offered include Cross training, speed shift, burn out, hills, Hi-lo Blocks, Warm up and HR targeting. Max user weight 396lbs. Refurbished and in good working order.

The Technogym Synchro Excite 700 with Utility Console is a premium commercial-grade elliptical trainer featuring advanced technology and entertainment features.

Built for high-volume use in commercial fitness facilities. This recumbent bike delivers reliable performance and durability.

ADJUSTABILITY:

HEART RATE MONITORING:

• Continuous heart rate monitoring during workouts

WORKOUT VARIETY:
